name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Weavely responses
description:
Add a new row in Google Sheets whenever a form is submitted in Weavely.ai. This template makes it easy to collect responses in a spreadsheet for tracking, reporting, or sharing with your team.

This template was created by Weavely.ai. For questions or support, visit [weavely.ai](https://www.weavely.ai/)
